summary: Seller can check whether the order can be canceled through this API and get corresponding reasons if not
description: Seller can check whether the order can be canceled through this API and get corresponding reasons if not.

query.name: order_item_id_list
query.description: all order items need to be cancel

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/order/reverse/cancel/validate','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("order_id", "0")
request.add_api_parameter("order_item_id_list", "[]")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/order/reverse/cancel/validate','GET')
request.add_api_param('order_id', '0')
request.add_api_param('order_item_id_list', '[]')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.message: E0102: trade order line id is empty or invalid
